mapper.insert: insert hm_crm_source_staff(RELATYPE, LINKID, SOURCEID, COMPANYID) (select '${relaType}' as RELATYPE,'${linkId}' AS LINKID,ID,'${companyId}' AS COMPANYID FROM hm_crm_source where CHANNELID = #{channelId} and COMPANYID = #{companyId});
mapper.delete: delete from hm_crm_source_staff where SOURCEID in (select id from hm_crm_source source where source.CHANNELID = #{channelId} and source.COMPANYID = #{companyId}) and COMPANYID = #{companyId}
delete from hm_crm_source_staff where SOURCEID in(select id from hm_crm_source source where source.id = #{sourceId} and source.COMPANYID = #{companyId}) and COMPANYID = #{companyId}

insert.foreach: insert hm_crm_source_staff(RELATYPE, LINKID, SOURCEID, COMPANYID) (select '${relaType}' as RELATYPE,'${item}' AS LINKID,ID,'${companyId}' AS COMPANYID FROM hm_crm_source where hm_crm_source.ID = #{sourceId} and COMPANYID = #{companyId});
